snippet: American and Chinese officials simultaneously broke the news on Wednesday afternoon that the blind dissident lawyer Chen Guangcheng had left the U.S. Embassy in Beijing. Within minutes, the Chinese followed up with a demand that the U.S. apologize...
abstract: American and Chinese officials simultaneously broke the news on Wednesday afternoon that the blind dissident lawyer Chen Guangcheng had left the U.S. Embassy in Beijing. Within minutes, the Chinese followed up with a demand that the U.S. apologize for harboring Mr. Chen.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
